Name: Crazy Hill Racing
About the game: You should hurry! You're running out of gas and you're still far from home. Crazy Hill Racing is a race game where you conquer valleys and hills with your car. Due to the lack of gasoline, everything becomes even more tense. Your mission is to press the accelerator as much as possible to be able to reach the final destination of every level without stopping the engine. But...Be very careful because the car is not the most controllable, so keep an eye on all its reactions. Let's hit the road! Game features: - 15 Maps - Lack of gasoline - 12 types of transport(F1,Bus,Armored,Monster,Van and more other)
